refnamediv.refpurpose: print the user names of users currently logged in to the current host

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Output who is currently logged in according to FILE. If FILE is not specified, use /var/run/utmp. /var/log/wtmp as FILE is common.

listitem.para: GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report users translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Written by Joseph Arceneaux and David MacKenzie.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for users is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and users programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
